Text.sandwich: A seagull flies by, stealing your sandwich
Text.quantity: QUANTITY OVER QUALITY! ZHONG YOU WERE WROOOOO---

Dice.r: Rolls dice. The formula is [# dice]d[# sides] + [modifiers or other dice]. e.g. /r 1d20+4
Dice.roll: Rolls dice. The formula is [#dice]d[# sides] + [modifiers or other dice]. e.g. /roll 1d20+4

Random.challenge: Gives you a random Fortnite challenge.
Random.fc: Gives you a random Fortnite challenge.

Edit.editchallenge: Edits the selected challenge. e.g. /editchallenge 4 A new challenge
Edit.editc: Edits the selected challenge. e.g. /editc 4 A new challenge
